context: Forward-facing dash-cam view of a city street intersection with a green traffic light visible ahead.
perception: The vehicle is stopped at a crosswalk at an intersection in an urban area. The traffic light ahead is green, indicating permission to proceed. prediction: The vehicle will start moving forward through the intersection as the light is green and no pedestrians are crossing.
planning: Proceed straight through the intersection while maintaining awareness of any pedestrians or vehicles that may enter the crosswalk or intersection unexpectedly.
